data.name: Blockhead 2D Demo
data.short_description: Just a basic starter for Blockhead 2D. It prepares you for the multiplayer experiences in the full version of the game and gets you used to the controls, specials, MEGAPOWERS and the characters attached to each. The full game is multiplayer. This is NOT what the actual, paid version is like.

content_descriptors.notes: Frequent, pixelized, bloody head injuries included.
